simj

Class SimScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • simj.SimScheduler

  • public final class SimScheduler
extends Object
    This class maintains the current time and has features for inserting new events or for finding the next event in the event list or future event chain (FETCH).
    Author:
    Patrik Fuhrer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void empty()
      Empties the scheduler completely.
      double getCurrentTime()
      Returns the current time of the simulation.
      SimEvent getNextEvent()
      Returns the next event that has to be executed.
      static SimScheduler getUniqueInstance()
      Returns the unique instance of this Singleton class.
      void insertEvent(SimEvent pSimEvent)
      Insert a given event in the future event chain.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Tells if the scheduler is empty or not.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • empty

        public void empty()
        Empties the scheduler completely.

      • getCurrentTime

        public double getCurrentTime()
        Returns the current time of the simulation.
        Returns:
        The current time of the simulation.

      • getNextEvent

        public SimEvent getNextEvent()
        Returns the next event that has to be executed.
        Returns:

      • getUniqueInstance

        Returns the unique instance of this Singleton class.

      • insertEvent

        public void insertEvent(SimEvent pSimEvent)
        Insert a given event in the future event chain.
        Parameters:
        pSimEvent - The event to add to the future event chain.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Tells if the scheduler is empty or not.
        Returns:
        true if there are no more events in the scheduler; false otherwise.
